title: Dust devil

properties.name: description
properties.value: A dust devil is a Slayer monster that requires level 65 Slayer to kill. They are located in the Smoke Dungeon and the Catacombs of Kourend. The use of a facemask or a Slayer helmet is required to fight dust devils as they use clouds of dust, sand, ash, and whatever else they can inhale to blind and disorient their victims. Dust devils cannot be assigned as a Slayer task until starting Desert Treasure.[1]

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dust devil
This article is about the slayer monster. For the superior variant, see Choke devil.
 This article has a strategy guide here.
All information on mechanics and strategy will be on this page.

A dust devil is a Slayer monster that requires level 65 Slayer to kill. They are located in the Smoke Dungeon and the Catacombs of Kourend. The use of a facemask or a Slayer helmet is required to fight dust devils as they use clouds of dust, sand, ash, and whatever else they can inhale to blind and disorient their victims. Dust devils cannot be assigned as a Slayer task until starting Desert Treasure.[1]

Slaying one in the Smoke Dungeon with a Slayer helmet equipped is a requirement for the Hard Desert Diary.

They are also popular for Bursting/Barraging and Chinning in the Catacombs of Kourend or Smoke Dungeon on task.

As dust devils use a ranged melee attack, they use their melee stats against their target's ranged defence, and can be blocked with Protect from Melee.

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Smoke Dungeon9344Maplink
Wilderness Slayer Cave939Maplink
Catacombs of Kourend11013Maplink
  • Smoke Dungeon - Found in the western part of the dungeon. You will also need to have started the Desert Treasure quest (and do it up to the point where you make and look into the mirrors) to gain access to the well. The entire time you are in the Smoke Dungeon, you must have the facemask or Slayer helmet equipped, or you will die very quickly.
  • Catacombs of Kourend - stronger dust devils can be found here; having a combat level of 110 with 130 hitpoints and a higher max hit. A facemask is still required and if not worn your stats will get reduced similar to aberrant spectres when a nosepeg is not worn. This area is a Multicombat area.
  • Wilderness Slayer Cave - Found in the mid-eastern chamber underneath the greater demons. This location is in the Wilderness and a multicombat area, do not bring items you are unwilling to lose.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 54,929,647 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Dust devil kill is worth 2,938.09.

The average Dust devil kill while on a Konar task is worth 4,263.47.

Added dust devils to the Wilderness Slayer Cave.

15 September 2016

The drop table was improved to include more valuable drops.

24 March 2016
(update | poll)

Increased the density of dust devil spawns.

The NPC was renamed from "Dustdevil" to "Dust devil".

18 April 2005
(update)

The NPC was added ingame.

26 January 2005
(update)

The NPC was added to the game cache.
